name: Sharewise
slogan: Helps you participate in your employers share plan
description: Sharewise offers a free app that enables employees of all levels to learn about share plans and invest in their future , so they can live the life they want to live. Our app delivers powerful Share Plan Education , lightning fast Share Plan Onboarding , stimulating Share Plan Engagement , direct access to affordable Share Plan Loans from responsible lenders that have already integrated with most major FTSE250 employers.

jobs.title: Lead Developper
jobs.description:
What are we looking for?

We are looking for a Mid-to-Senior Software Engineer with a passion for finance for good to join our team in a lead technical role. You will be with us from the beginning and will have a unique opportunity to shape the future of our product. This is an opportunity to grow and develop your skills and build a team of your own in an early stage startup.

The first demo version of the product has been built with Ruby as a primary language, so good familiarity with Ruby is desirable.

Key responsibilities:

- Work together with us to iteratively define the product features
- Drive the development of our platform; from owning end to end new feature development to helping scale and harden the core backend services
- Contribute positively to our engineering and company culture

Qualifications

- BA/BS degree in Computer Science or equivalent technical work experience
- 4+ years of development experience
- Experience developing and executing on a software roadmap and delivery on time
- Experience managing a full stack system
- Experience or willingness to lead the development of a mobile app 

Desirable Qualifications

- Ability to identify and communicate problems
- Willingness to learn
- Experience building teams and recruiting software engineers
- A passion for people management and mentorship
jobs.descriptionHtml:
What are we looking for?

We are looking for a Mid-to-Senior Software Engineer with a passion for finance for good to join our team in a lead technical role. You will be with us from the beginning and will have a unique opportunity to shape the future of our product. This is an opportunity to grow and develop your skills and build a team of your own in an early stage startup.

The first demo version of the product has been built with Ruby as a primary language, so good familiarity with Ruby is desirable.

Key responsibilities:

  • Work together with us to iteratively define the product features
  • Drive the development of our platform; from owning end to end new feature development to helping scale and harden the core backend services
  • Contribute positively to our engineering and company culture

Qualifications

  • BA/BS degree in Computer Science or equivalent technical work experience
  • 4+ years of development experience
  • Experience developing and executing on a software roadmap and delivery on time
  • Experience managing a full stack system
  • Experience or willingness to lead the development of a mobile app

Desirable Qualifications

  • Ability to identify and communicate problems
  • Willingness to learn
  • Experience building teams and recruiting software engineers
  • A passion for people management and mentorship
skills: Ruby, Rails, Javascript, jQuery, SQL, React.Js, HTML5/CSS, Node.Js, Git
